author: nvoytish
body: The RU builder thresholds are made looser on second and third iterations of the builder in order to increase the efficiency of the segment reconstruction for cases with "soft" muons, when the trajectory bends on a scale of a CSC detector. Related presentation can be found here https://indico.cern.ch/event/784929/contributions/3265299/attachments/1777781/2890942/19_01_11-Voytishin_Palichik-CSCSegBuilder_proposal_RECO_meeting.pdf
title: Update CSC RU segment builder
